content.title: 「あなたは私が誇りに思う理由です」ネイティブのタイトルの母、ボニータ・マボは州の葬儀でお会いしました -  ABCニュース
「母国語の母親」入札の別れ - オーストラリア人
content.desc: Bonita Mabo was remembered at a state funeral in Queensland yesterday as an indigenous and South Sea Islander activist and the “mother of native title’’. Hundreds of people attended the service in Townsville for Dr Mabo — the widow of land rights campaigner Eddie Koiki Mabo — who died last week just days after being awarded an honorary ­doctorate of letters from James Cook University. She campaigned alongside her late husband during his long fight for indigenous land rights and spent 10 years on the Central Queensland Land Council. Queensland Premier Annastacia Palaszczuk described Dr Mabo ...
